name: Triangle Boi
description:
You are a Triangle but with guns 🤔 ?

drops == After killing an enemy or breaking a create a random thing will be droped for you to use.

---Weapons----
there are currently only 4 weapon
1. Glock (default)
2. Ak47 (found in drops)
3. MiniGun (found in drops)
4. Sniper (found in drops)

----Power Up----
1. Bullet Time (found in drops)
2. Heath (found in drops)

---Controls----
WASD to move
Mouse to aim
SPACE to shoot
Q to change weapon
